nodes.text: Hipan Voge was a male textile merchant from Naboo.

1.5 years ABY his partner retired after 15 years in business to live off the wealth he had amassed and left Voge his business. Soon Voge discovered that his former partner had failed to honor certain debts to a gang of local smugglers when the gang visited him to collect on those debts. His former partner refused to acknowledge the debts and Voge didn't have the money to pay off the smugglers. As the gang even threatened Voge's family, Voge resorted to hiring a team of experienced spacers to handle those criminals and "make sure they don't trouble anyone else again".

Voge is mentioned in the mission "Insure safe import of fabrics" which is available at Mission Terminals on the planet Naboo in Star Wars Galaxies. To fulfill the mission the player has to attack a small random base and kill several enemy NPCs.
